h1_title: How to Claim Deluxe Edition Items
h2_title: What Do You Get in the Black Myth: Wukong Deluxe Edition?
alt_text: How To Claim Deluxe Edition Items \(4\).png
img_above_text:
# How to Claim Deluxe Edition Items
If you already have or are considering upgrading to the Deluxe Edition of Black Myth: Wukong, you might be wondering how to claim the Deluxe Edition Items that come with it. Thankfully, there's an easy way in-game to claim your bonus loot and on this page, we'll talk you through how to do it.
## What Do You Get in the Black Myth: Wukong Deluxe Edition?
### Armor
* Folk Opera Mask
* Folk Opera Almsgiving Armor
* Folk Opera Leather Bracers
* Folk Opera Buskins

img_summary: The image showcases a character from the game Black Myth: Wukong wearing the Folk Opera Almsgiving Armor set, which is part of the Deluxe Edition items. The character is depicted in a detailed and immersive environment, highlighting the intricate design and cultural elements of the armor. This visual representation serves to illustrate the exclusive armor items that players can claim in-game if they purchase the Deluxe Edition, as described in the document titled "How to Claim Deluxe Edition Items" under the section "What Do You Get in the Black Myth: Wukong Deluxe Edition?"
